data.title: LA CHAMBRE, Marin Cureau de (1594-1675). L'Art de connoistre les hommes. Amsterdam: Jacques le Jeune [Louis and Daniel Elzevier?], 1660. 12° (128 x 70mm). Engraved title, woodcut ornaments. With blank
data.meta_description: LA CHAMBRE, Marin Cureau de (1594-1675). L'Art de connoistre les hommes. Amsterdam: Jacques le Jeune [Louis and Daniel Elzevier?], 1660. 12° (128 x 70mm). Engraved title, woodcut ornaments. With blank *2. (Lacks final errata leaf, title without inner blank margin, small fault on E1r affecting bottom lines.) Contemporary red morocco gilt by Capé, later supralibros. Provenance: P. Brunet (ex libris) -- purchased from L. Giraud-Badin, 1935. First of two editions published at this date, often found joined with the author's Caractères des passions (Amsterdam: 1658-63) though not here. Brunet III, 726; Willems 1260.
data.text: With 4 other 12° works: Vincent Voiture, Les Lettres. Amsterdam: Jean de Ravesteyn, 1657. Morocco by Bauzonnet-Trautz; Jules Baron, L'Art heraldique. Paris: Charles Osmont, 1681. Plates. Calf gilt by Trautz-Bauzonnet, 1857. Ex libris C.J. Lovis; René Aubert de Vertot, Histoire de la conjuration de Portugal. Paris: la veuve d'Edmé Martin, Jean Boudot et Estienne Martin, 1689. Morocco by Lortic. Ex libris Ambrose Firmin Didot; Jaques de Saulx-Tavannes, Mémoires. Cologne: Pierre Marteau, 1691. Contemporary calf. (5)
